main.name: Angelo B. Palma
main.description: I'm a Web/Full Stack Developer. I'm a type of person who's willing to learn because learning is an experience.
main.bio: There's no job been easy to work. All job is difficult. That's why I always think positive mind to make my brain calm and comfortable every time I'm facing an obstacle. There's no problem in this world would not be solve. All problems running to our mind has solutions. You only need to do is think about it with a positive mind.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I'm current full time web/full stack developer on a certain company in Japan. We're developing websites using react-js, react-native webview, firebase, custom-hooks, redux, ES6, TypeScript

I've learnt basics and fundamental here of Electronics & Accounting

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: I've achieve a 160 hours estimated time here. That's a big thing for me that I've achieved this. Furthermore, What we actually do here is developing websites with various of languages and frameworks. I'm assign on ReactJS team which composed of ReactJS, Redux, NextJS, Custom-Hooks, Container, React-Native web-view, React-Router, Material-UI, Firebase and Cypress. Our workflow here is waterfall. Assigning a task here is thru ticketing from red-mine to slack.

testimonials.text: Life is not just the passing of time. Life is the collection of experiences and their intensity.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
